name: Crankin Car
description:
Cranky Car is a high score arcade game for the playdate.  Crank the car up to get as close as possible the the randomized target in order to land the car at the center of the target. Try and get as close as you can on each of the three rounds to get the highest score possible.

The music was not made by me (Kevin Macleod: Cyborg Ninja)

** THIS HAS NOT YET BEEN TESTED ON THE PLAYDATE SO USE THE SIMULATOR IF THERE ARE ISSUES **

This game was made for the PlayJam 2 game jam
